processing_structure.text: Receive the input (read an integer n).
Loop from 1 to the input value.

advice.text: Focus on the missing details inside the loop: what exactly should happen for each i from 1 to n?
Break the loop step into control actions: iterate, test a condition for each i, and update the sum when the condition holds.
Write sub-comments under 'Loop' such as: 'for i from 1 to n', 'if i divides n then add i to sum'; then translate each sub-comment into code and finally print the sum.
